channel.title: Data Structure on Sun Xichen's site
channel.description: Recent content in Data Structure on Sun Xichen's site

item.title: Linked List
item.description: When writing code involving linked list, we must always be careful to properly handle the exception cases ( when the linked list is empty, when the list has only one or two nodes ) and the boundary cases ( dealing with the first or last items ). Reverse a Linked List Write a function that takes the head Node in a linked list as argument and (destructively) reverses the list, returning the head Node in the result.

item.title: 栈序列可生成性问题
item.description: 假定某client按照一系列混合操作栈的push,pop操作。push将0~9按照顺序push.判断一下哪些序列不会出现？ a. 4 3 2 1 0 9 8 7 6 5 b. 4 6 9 7 5 3 2 9 0 1 c. 2 6 8 7 5 3 2 9 0 1 d. 4 3 2 1 0 5 6 7 8 9 e. 1 2 3 4 5 6 9 8 7 0 f. 0 4 6 5 3 8 1 7 2 9 g. 1 4 7 9 8 6 5 3 0 2 h.
